00021 class TSerializableContainer: public TContainer<ItemClass>, virtual public iser::ISerializable
00022 {
00023 public:
00024        typedef TContainer<ItemClass> BaseClass;

00030        // abstract methods

00043 template <typename ItemClass>
00044 bool TSerializableContainer<ItemClass>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00045 {
00046        static iser::CArchiveTag itemsTag("Items", "List of items");
00047        static iser::CArchiveTag itemTag("Item", "Item");
00048 
00049        istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(archive.IsStoring()? NULL: this);
00050 
00051        int itemCount = int(BaseClass::m_items.size());
00052 
00053        bool retVal = archive.BeginMultiTag(itemsTag, itemTag, itemCount);
00054        if (!retVal){
00055               return false;
00056        }
00057 
00058        if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00059               BaseClass::Reset();
00060               BaseClass::m_items.reserve(itemCount);
00061 
00062               for (int index = 0; index < itemCount; index++){
00063                      BaseClass::PushBack(ItemClass());
00064 
00065                      ItemClass& item = BaseClass::GetAt(index);
00066 
00067                      bool retVal = archive.BeginTag(itemTag);
00068 
00069                      retVal = retVal && SerializeItem(item, archive);
00070 
00071                      retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(itemTag);
00072               }
00073        }
00074        else{
00075               for (int index = 0; index < itemCount; index++){
00076                      ItemClass& item = BaseClass::GetAt(index);
00077 
00078                      bool retVal = archive.BeginTag(itemTag);
00079 
00080                      retVal = retVal && SerializeItem(item, archive);
00081 
00082                      retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(itemTag);
00083               }
00084        }
00085 
00086        return retVal;
00087 }
